func main() {
clusterIP := "10.7.111.132"
podIP := "10.5.41.204"
port := 80
proto := "tcp"

addRedirectRules(clusterIP, port, proto)
createProxy(podIP, port, proto)
}

func addRedirectRules(clusterIP string, port int, proto string) error {
p := strconv.Itoa(port)
cmd := exec.Command("iptables", "-t", "nat", "-A", "OUTPUT", "-p", "tcp",
"-d", clusterIP, "--dport", p, "-j", "REDIRECT", "--to-port", p)
return cmd.Run()
}

func createProxy(podIP string, port int, proto string) {
host := ""
listener, err := net.Listen(proto, net.JoinHostPort(host, strconv.Itoa(port)))

for {
inConn, err := listener.Accept()
outConn, err := net.Dial(proto, net.JoinHostPort(podIP, strconv.Itoa(port)))

go func(in, out *net.TCPConn) {
var wg sync.WaitGroup
wg.Add(2)
fmt.Printf("Proxying %v <-> %v <-> %v <-> %v\n",
in.RemoteAddr(), in.LocalAddr(), out.LocalAddr(), out.RemoteAddr())
go copyBytes(in, out, &wg)
go copyBytes(out, in, &wg)
wg.Wait()
}(inConn.(*net.TCPConn), outConn.(*net.TCPConn))
}

listener.Close()
}

func copyBytes(dst, src *net.TCPConn, wg *sync.WaitGroup) {
defer wg.Done()
if _, err := io.Copy(dst, src); err != nil {
if !strings.HasSuffix(err.Error(), "use of closed network connection") {
fmt.Printf("io.Copy error: %v", err)
}
}
dst.Close()
src.Close()
}

$ cat add-dnat-structured.sh
source ../ENV

set -x

KUBE_SVCS="KUBE-SERVICES"        # chain that serves as kubernetes service portal
SVC_WEBAPP="KUBE-SVC-WEBAPP"     # chain that serves as DNAT entrypoint for webapp
WEBAPP_EP1="KUBE-SEP-WEBAPP1"    # chain that performs dnat to pod1
WEBAPP_EP2="KUBE-SEP-WEBAPP2"    # chain that performs dnat to pod2

# OUTPUT -> KUBE-SERVICES
sudo iptables -t nat -N $KUBE_SVCS
sudo iptables -t nat -A OUTPUT -p all -s 0.0.0.0/0 -d 0.0.0.0/0 -j $KUBE_SVCS

# KUBE-SERVICES -> KUBE-SVC-WEBAPP
sudo iptables -t nat -N $SVC_WEBAPP
sudo iptables -t nat -A $KUBE_SVCS -p $PROTO -s 0.0.0.0/0 -d $CLUSTER_IP --dport $PORT -j $SVC_WEBAPP

# KUBE-SVC-WEBAPP -> KUBE-SEP-WEBAPP*
sudo iptables -t nat -N $WEBAPP_EP1
sudo iptables -t nat -N $WEBAPP_EP2
sudo iptables -t nat -A $WEBAPP_EP1 -p $PROTO -s 0.0.0.0/0 -d 0.0.0.0/0 --dport $PORT -j DNAT --to-destination $POD1_IP:$PORT
sudo iptables -t nat -A $WEBAPP_EP2 -p $PROTO -s 0.0.0.0/0 -d 0.0.0.0/0 --dport $PORT -j DNAT --to-destination $POD2_IP:$PORT
sudo iptables -t nat -A $SVC_WEBAPP -p $PROTO -s 0.0.0.0/0 -d 0.0.0.0/0 -m statistic --mode random --probability 0.5  -j $WEBAPP_EP1
sudo iptables -t nat -A $SVC_WEBAPP -p $PROTO -s 0.0.0.0/0 -d 0.0.0.0/0 -m statistic --mode random --probability 1.0  -j $WEBAPP_EP2

è¿™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª O(1) ä»£ç†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸ IPVS ç›¸æ¯”å…·æœ‰æ›´é«˜çš„æ€§èƒ½ã€‚

è®©æˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹çœ‹å¦‚ä½•åœ¨ä¸åˆ° 100 è¡Œ C ä»£ç ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ eBPF å®ç°ä»£ç†åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

å…ˆå†³æ¡ä»¶

å¦‚æœä½ æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿçš„æ—¶é—´å’Œå…´è¶£æ¥é˜…è¯» eBPF/BPFï¼Œå¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘é˜…è¯» Cilium: BPF and XDP Reference Guideï¼Œå®ƒå¯¹å¼€å‘äººå‘˜æ¥è¯´æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œç¾çš„ BPF æ–‡æ¡£ã€‚

å®ç°

è®©æˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹çœ‹å‡ºå£éƒ¨åˆ†çš„åŸºæœ¬æ¦‚å¿µï¼š

  1. å¯¹äºæ‰€æœ‰æµé‡ï¼ŒåŒ¹é… dst=CLUSTER_IP && proto==TCP && dport==80
  2. æ›´æ”¹ç›®æ ‡ IPï¼šCLUSTER_IP -> POD_IP
  3. æ›´æ–° IP å’Œ TCP æŠ¥å¤´ä¸­çš„æ ¡éªŒå’Œæ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦åˆ™æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ•°æ®åŒ…å°†è¢«ä¸¢å¼ƒï¼‰
__section("egress")
int tc_egress(struct __sk_buff *skb)
{
    const __be32 cluster_ip = 0x846F070A; // 10.7.111.132
    const __be32 pod_ip = 0x0529050A;     // 10.5.41.5

    const int l3_off = ETH_HLEN;    // IP header offset
    const int l4_off = l3_off + 20; // TCP header offset: l3_off + sizeof(struct iphdr)
    __be32 sum;                     // IP checksum

    void *data = (void *)(long)skb->data;
    void *data_end = (void *)(long)skb->data_end;
    if (data_end < data + l4_off) { // not our packet
        return TC_ACT_OK;
    }

    struct iphdr *ip4 = (struct iphdr *)(data + l3_off);
    if (ip4->daddr != cluster_ip || ip4->protocol != IPPROTO_TCP /* || tcp->dport == 80 */) {
        return TC_ACT_OK;
    }

    // DNAT: cluster_ip -> pod_ip, then update L3 and L4 checksum
    sum = csum_diff((void *)&ip4->daddr, 4, (void *)&pod_ip, 4, 0);
    skb_store_bytes(skb, l3_off + offsetof(struct iphdr, daddr), (void *)&pod_ip, 4, 0);
    l3_csum_replace(skb, l3_off + offsetof(struct iphdr, check), 0, sum, 0);
l4_csum_replace(skb, l4_off + offsetof(struct tcphdr, check), 0, sum, BPF_F_PSEUDO_HDR);

    return TC_ACT_OK;
}

å¯¹äºå…¥å£éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œéå¸¸ç±»ä¼¼äºå‡ºå£ä»£ç ï¼š

__section("ingress")
int tc_ingress(struct __sk_buff *skb)
{
    const __be32 cluster_ip = 0x846F070A; // 10.7.111.132
    const __be32 pod_ip = 0x0529050A;     // 10.5.41.5

    const int l3_off = ETH_HLEN;    // IP header offset
    const int l4_off = l3_off + 20; // TCP header offset: l3_off + sizeof(struct iphdr)
    __be32 sum;                     // IP checksum

    void *data = (void *)(long)skb->data;
    void *data_end = (void *)(long)skb->data_end;
    if (data_end < data + l4_off) { // not our packet
        return TC_ACT_OK;
    }

    struct iphdr *ip4 = (struct iphdr *)(data + l3_off);
    if (ip4->saddr != pod_ip || ip4->protocol != IPPROTO_TCP /* || tcp->dport == 80 */) {
        return TC_ACT_OK;
    }

    // SNAT: pod_ip -> cluster_ip, then update L3 and L4 header
    sum = csum_diff((void *)&ip4->saddr, 4, (void *)&cluster_ip, 4, 0);
    skb_store_bytes(skb, l3_off + offsetof(struct iphdr, saddr), (void *)&cluster_ip, 4, 0);
    l3_csum_replace(skb, l3_off + offsetof(struct iphdr, check), 0, sum, 0);
l4_csum_replace(skb, l4_off + offsetof(struct tcphdr, check), 0, sum, BPF_F_PSEUDO_HDR);

    return TC_ACT_OK;
}

$ cat compile-and-load.sh
set -x

NIC=eth0

# compile c code into bpf code
clang -O2 -Wall -c toy-proxy-bpf.c -target bpf -o toy-proxy-bpf.o

# add tc queuing discipline (egress and ingress buffer)
sudo tc qdisc del dev $NIC clsact 2>&1 >/dev/null
sudo tc qdisc add dev $NIC clsact

# load bpf code into the tc egress and ingress hook respectively
sudo tc filter add dev $NIC egress bpf da obj toy-proxy-bpf.o sec egress
sudo tc filter add dev $NIC ingress bpf da obj toy-proxy-bpf.o sec ingress

# show info
sudo tc filter show dev $NIC egress
sudo tc filter show dev $NIC ingress

Â  Â  Â public static Set<String> jsonObjectKeySet(String bkey, JSONObject node, boolean dealStringJson) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Set<String> keySet = new HashSet<String>();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Set<String> strings = node.keySet();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â for (String key : strings) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Object value = node.get(key);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â String myKey = key;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (!StringUtils.isBlank(bkey)) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â myKey = bkey + "." + key;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.add(myKey);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (value instanceof JSONObject || value instanceof JSONArray) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonKeySet(myKey, value, dealStringJson));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (dealStringJson && value instanceof String) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â String strJson = (String) value;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (strJson.startsWith("{") && strJson.endsWith("}")) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonKeySet(myKey, JSONObject.parseObject(strJson), dealStringJson));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (strJson.startsWith("[") && strJson.endsWith("]")) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â System.out.println("@@@" + strJson);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â JSONArray parseObject = JSONArray.parseArray(strJson);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonKeySet(myKey, parseObject, dealStringJson));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â return keySet;
Â  Â   }

Â  Â  Â public static Set<String> jsonKeySet(String bkey, Object node, boolean dealStringJson) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Set<String> keySet = new HashSet<String>();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (node instanceof JSONObject) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonObjectKeySet(bkey, (JSONObject) node, dealStringJson));
Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (node instanceof JSONArray) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Iterator<Object> iterator = ((JSONArray) node).iterator();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â while (iterator.hasNext()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Object next = iterator.next();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â String bsKey = bkey + "[x]";
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (next instanceof JSONObject) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonObjectKeySet(bsKey, (JSONObject) next, dealStringJson));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â return keySet;
Â  Â   }

Â  Â  Â /**
Â  Â  Â  * åˆ©ç”¨Jacksonå®ç°ç®€å•çš„jsoné”®å€¼æå–
Â  Â  Â  * @param bKey
Â  Â  Â  * @param node
Â  Â  Â  * @return
Â  Â  Â  * @throws IOException
Â  Â  Â  */
Â  Â  Â public static Set<String> jsonLeaf(String bKey, JsonNode node) throws IOException {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Set<String> keySet = new HashSet<String>();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (node.isValueNode()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â String strJson = node.toString();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (strJson.startsWith("{") && strJson.endsWith("}")) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ObjectMapper jackson = new ObjectMapper();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â JsonNode nodeStr = jackson.readTree(strJson);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonLeaf(bKey, nodeStr));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (strJson.startsWith("[") && strJson.endsWith("]")) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ObjectMapper jackson = new ObjectMapper();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â JsonNode nodeStr = jackson.readTree(strJson);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonLeaf(bKey + "[x]", nodeStr));
Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â return keySet;
Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (node.isObject()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> it = node.fields();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â while (it.hasNext()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> entry = it.next();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â String key = entry.getKey();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (!StringUtils.isBlank(bKey)) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â key = bKey + "." + key;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.add(key);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â JsonNode value = entry.getValue();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (value.isContainerNode()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonLeaf(key, value));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â if (node.isArray()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Iterator<JsonNode> it = node.iterator();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â while (it.hasNext()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â keySet.addAll(jsonLeaf(bKey + "[x]", it.next()));
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â  Â  Â  Â   }
Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â return keySet;
Â  Â   }
